data.title: bd-1ah7: Use AGENT env var in agent spawn commands
data.description: Changed botty spawn --env flags from BOTBUS_AGENT to AGENT in responder.rs (lead spawn) and dev_loop/prompt.rs (worker dispatch template). This aligns with the new AGENT env var convention.

data.reason: Clean env var rename. No security concerns: values are programmatically constructed (not user-controlled), backwards-compat fallback to BOTBUS_AGENT exists in all consumers, no new attack surface.
